page.title: 08Merebrow C of E Primary Sch.
page.content: The school in Merebrow is called Merebrow C of E Primary School. 81 pupils attend it. The old part of the school was built in 1847. The new part was begun in 1967 and was finished by November 1968. The present head teacher is Mrs. Riley there is one other full time teacher and three part time teachers. The old head teacher's house is now used as a boiler room, upstairs store room and an office. There are three classrooms in the school. The infants 34 children. Classes one and two Juniors 24 children and Classes three and four Juniors 23 children. There is a hall, which is also used as a diningroom, a kitchen, a library, a storeroom, a P.E. store and Staffroom. We have a long flat field where we play football and other sports and a playground.
